description: This file implements an in-memory repository class for managing Workflow objects, including methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and listing workflows with filtering options. It also includes helper functions and constants related to workflow stages and statuses.

classes.name: InMemoryWorkflowRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository for Workflow objects, supporting create, get, update, and list operations with filtering.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the repository with an empty dictionary and a reentrant lock.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Stores a new Workflow object in the repository.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a Workflow by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Workflow in the repository.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of Workflows filtered by optional criteria such as domain, author, branch, commit, stage, status, with pagination support.
